ref: 4417 ghaṭṭáyati1 ʻ rubs, touches, shakes ʼ Suśr., gháṭṭatē Dhātup., ghaṭṭita -- MBh. 2. *ghōṭṭ -- . [Derivation of ghaṭṭ -- from ghr̥ṣṭa -- is phonet. difficult in view of ghaṭṭēti in Pa. canonical texts and co -- existence of *ghōṭṭ -- (Sanskritized as ghuṣṭa -- ʻ rubbed ʼ) in NIA. They are prob. words of non -- Aryan, perhaps Mu., origin (PMWS 56) which have collided with MIA. ghaṭṭha -- . -- √ghaṭṭ1]
Pa. ghaṭṭēti ʻ dashes against, touches ʼ;
Pk. ghaṭṭaï ʻ touches, rubs against ʼ;
B. ghã̄ṭā ʻ to stir with the fingers ʼ;
Or. ghāṭibā ʻ to brand with a hot iron ʼ;
M. ghāṭnẽ ʻ to bruise, mash, beat ʼ;
Si. gaṭanavā, pret. gäṭuvā ʻ to dash together ʼ.
